entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is introduced as a character with a newly uncovered eye and a discolored and swollen face. He is speaking to Umbridge about his health.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge is introduced as a character who is questioning Hagrid's story about being away for his health. She has a condescending tone and is described as having 'sweet' words.

relationships.description: Hagrid and Umbridge are engaged in a conversation about Hagrid's health. Umbridge is questioning his story, and Hagrid is trying to come up with an excuse.
